about_the_game:
Not everyone likes to clean, but in our world, it is an invitation to an extraordinary adventure that only a few can afford...

Overdue bills force you to participate in an annual cleaning contest. However, the underrated job of a maintenance guy turns out to be something more than you imagined...
In this (un)realistic simulator you will visit places that mere mortals don't have access to. See things that are only seen by the few. Would you like to explore the rooms that only the president has access to? Clean up after the alien autopsy? Or maybe even make hell a bit less filthy? Dirty work falls on your shoulders, but you can turn any crap into an epic adventure!




You will meet a lot of puzzles and riddles on your path- solving them will show you the way to cleanliness.

There are no closed doors for a cleaner/janitor/maintenance guy/whatever needs to be done guy. In order to clean up the whole locations you will have to explore them as thoroughly as possible. Sometimes you will have to find a way out of a no-way-out situation. But who would have thought that simple tools could be used to breach the most complex security systems...

Your gear:

  • Mop (and a bucket of course)
  • Sponge
  • Flashlight
  • Pressure washer
  • Vacuum cleaner
  • Trash bin
  • Bug spray
  • Glue
  • And last but not least, your very own hands



*These are the images from a demo level. More locations are to be revealed!*

name: The Mystery Cleaner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 380x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development, system requirements may change.

short_description: Play the role of a janitor who specializes in "unusual" orders. Clean up the most iconic locations in the world and uncover their (dirty) secrets. Highly guarded facilities, unusual situations, all that mess to deal with... sounds like a challenge!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
